text: Ojo nadidaī, ki Alloh taolo ʙorone az osmon firistod va onro [ʙa surati] caşmahoe dar zamin çorī soxt. On goh ʙa vasilai on kiştzore ʙo ranghoi gunogun padid meovarad. Sipas paƶmurda megardad va meʙinī, ki zard şudaast. On goh onro xurdu xoşok mesozad? Be tardid, dar in [digarguniho] pande ʙaroi xiradmandon ast
